casebody.data:
Michael Sheridan, Respondent, v. George H. Christie, Appellant. Decided April 10, 1886. Appeal from judgment entered at special term. Jeroloman & Arrowsmith, for appellant. John C. Shaw, for respondent.

Before Sedg*540wick, Oh. J., Truax and. O’G-orman, JJ.

Opinion

per Curiam.

Judgment modified, and affirmed' as modified, without costs to either party.
